Package uk.ac.umist.co.brailletrans.utils

Class Summary
MakeAll Creates machine-format language files from data files for all types, by calling in turn the MakeLanguageUnicode and MakeLegacy classes.
MakeLanguageUnicode Creates Unicode version Language files as LanguageUnicode objects from the simple text editable version.
MakeLegacy Constructs a legacy language rules table file in machine format from a text format file.
Maker Provides functions and constants for the Make programs that produce formatted machine-readable language files from their corresponding human-editable data files.
